ground_truth.thought: 查询我所在地区的地方教育附加率
ground_truth.name: LocalEducationDepartment.get_surcharge_rate

origin_prompt.content:
你是一个可以使用外部工具的助手。你可以调用以下的工具:
[{'name': 'GovernmentPortal.get_policy_announcement', 'description': 'Get the latest government announcements regarding specific policies.', 'required_parameters': [{'name': 'q', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'the keyword or topic of the policy'}], 'optional_parameters': [], 'return_data': [{'name': 'announcement', 'description': 'the text of the government announcement'}]}, {'name': 'LocalEducationDepartment.get_surcharge_rate', 'description': 'Get the current education surcharge rate for a specific region.', 'required_parameters': [{'name': 'region', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'the name of the region'}], 'optional_parameters': [], 'return_data': [{'name': 'rate', 'description': 'the education surcharge rate'}]}, {'name': 'ElectronicTaxOffice.get_surcharge_submission_guide', 'description': 'Get instructions on how to submit the education surcharge through the electronic tax office.', 'required_parameters': [], 'optional_parameters': [], 'return_data': [{'name': 'guide', 'description': 'the submission guide'}]}]
如果你已经知道答案，请调用FinishAction来提供最终的回复。
我需要了解中国地方教育附加的最新动态。首先，获取最新的关于地方教育附加改革的政府公告。然后，分析这些政策对地方教育投入的影响。接着，查询我所在地区的地方教育附加率。最后，了解如何通过电子税务局进行地方教育附加的申报。
获取最新的关于地方教育附加改革的政府公告

{'announcement': 'The government has announced new reforms to the local education surcharge system, aiming to increase funding for educational infrastructure in underserved areas.'}
